span.span: Retrieves a value that indicates whether or not any manual filtering is applied to the .

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: 此属性提供了一种简单的方式，便于检查是否为透视字段应用手动筛选或。
用于 OLAP 数据透视表，此属性是仅适用于CubeField对象。获取或设置中的 OLAP透视字段对象在尝试将返回一个运行时错误。
对于数据透视表，该属性是可用于PivotField对象。
默认值为True。 此属性自动设置为True时应用任何手动筛选 (无论属性是True或False)。应用任何手动筛选后会自动设置为False (无论属性是True或False)。
此属性直接反映透视字段或多维数据集的筛选器下拉列表中全选复选框状态。
This property provides a simple way to easily check whether manual filtering is applied to a PivotField or .
For OLAP PivotTables, this property is available only for the CubeField object. Trying to get or set it on the PivotField object in an OLAP will return a run-time error.
For PivotTables, this property is available for the PivotField object.

The default value is True. This property is automatically set to True when no manual filtering is applied (independent of whether the property is True or False). It is automatically set to False when any manual filtering is applied (independent of whether the property is True or False).
This property directly reflects the state of the Select All check box in the filter drop-down list for the PivotField or CubeField.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AutoSortCustomSubtotal As Integer
public: property int AutoSortCustomSubtotal { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回对应于用于排序指定的自定义分类汇总的整数自动字段。

span.span: Returns an integer corresponding to the custom subtotal used to sort the specified field automatically.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: 默认值是 1 （自动）。当AutoSortCustomSubtotal属性设置为 1 （自动） 时，数据进行排序的正则分类汇总。AutoSortCustomSubtotal属性可以具有下表中列出的索引值之一。
排序仅支持实际因此尝试将AutoSortCustomSubtotal设置为一个值，代表数据透视表视图将自定义分类汇总不在数据透视表中显示的自定义分类汇总返回一个运行时错误。
如果排序应用基于自定义分类汇总，且从数据透视表中删除该分类汇总，则AutoSortCustomSubtotal属性将自动设置为默认值 (1)。

The default value is 1 (Automatic). When the AutoSortCustomSubtotal property is set to 1 (Automatic), the data is sorted by the regular subtotals. The AutoSortCustomSubtotal property can have one of the index values listed in the following table.

Sorting is supported only by custom subtotals that are actually displayed in the PivotTable, so trying to set AutoSortCustomSubtotal to a value representing a custom subtotal not in the PivotTable view will return a run-time error.
If sorting is applied based on a custom subtotal, and that subtotal is removed from the PivotTable, the AutoSortCustomSubtotal property will automatically be set to the default value (1).

This property applies to PivotTables that are connected to an OLAP data source. Attempting to return or set this property with a PivotTable that is not connected to an OLAP data source will result in a run-time error.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DatabaseSort { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 设置为True时，手动更改数据透视表字段中的项目的位置被允许。

span.span: When set to True, manual repositioning of items in a PivotTable field is allowed.

summary.span: 如果字段中没有手动定位的项目，则返回True 。

span.span: Returns True if the field has no manually positioned items.

summary.span: 可读写 Boolean。

span.span: Read/write Boolean.

span.para: 如果数据源不是联机分析处理 (OLAP) 数据源，则 DatabaseSort属性返回False 。
如果数据源是 OLAP，并且对字段应用既没有自定义排序也没有自动排序，此属性返回True 。
OLAP 数据透视表，将 DatabaseSort属性设置为True，将删除的任何自定义排序或对字段应用自动排序 （换句话说，数据透视表将还原为默认行为进行连接时）。
将 DatabaseSort属性设置为False会导致排序次序变为当前的顺序的项目，如果没有自动排序。
将 DatabaseSort属性设置为True或False都会引起更新。
非 OLAP 源或 OLAP 数据字段将 DatabaseSort属性设置为True将导致运行时错误。
The DatabaseSort property returns False if the data source is not an Online Analytical Processing (OLAP) data source.
This property returns True if the data source is OLAP and neither custom ordering nor automatic sorting has been applied to the field.

Setting the DatabaseSort property to True, for an OLAP PivotTable, will remove any custom ordering or automatic sort applied to the field (in other words, the PivotTable reverts to the default behavior when the connection was made).
Setting the DatabaseSort property to False will cause the sort order to be the current order of the items, if no automatic sort is applied.
Setting the DatabaseSort property to either True or False causes an Update.
Setting the DatabaseSort property to True for a non-OLAP source or an OLAP data field causes a run-time error.

This operation can only be performed on fields that are actually on the . So either a hierarchy containing the requested has to be in rows or columns of the , or the attribute/relational field has to be in rows or columns of the placed next to at least one other attribute/relational field. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Formula { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置以 A1 样式表示法读/写String对象的公式。

span.span: Returns or sets the object's formula in A1-style notation Read/write String.

remarks.span:
此属性不可用于 OLAP 数据源。
如果单元格包含常量，该属性返回的常量。如果单元格为空，该公式属性将返回空字符串。如果单元格包含公式， Formula属性会将该公式返回相同的格式将公式栏 （包括等号） 中显示的字符串形式。如果设置为日期值或单元格公式的
，Microsoft Excel 将检查以查看是否已设置该单元格格式之一的日期或时间的数字格式。如果没有，Microsoft Excel 将号码格式设为默认的短日期数字格式。如果该区域是一个-或两维范围
，可以将公式设置为相同尺寸的 Visual Basic 阵列中。同样，将公式放到 Visual Basic 阵列中。
的多个单元格区域填充公式的范围中的所有单元格设置公式。

span.para: This property is not available for OLAP data sources.

If the cell contains a constant, this property returns the constant. If the cell is empty, this Formula property returns an empty string. If the cell contains a formula, the Formula property returns the formula as a string in the same format that would be displayed in the formula bar (including the equal sign).

If you set the value or formula of a cell to a date, Microsoft Excel checks to see whether that cell is already formatted with one of the date or time number formats. If not, Microsoft Excel changes the number format to the default short date number format.
If the range is a one- or two-dimensional range, you can set the formula to a Visual Basic array of the same dimensions. Similarly, you can put the formula into a Visual Basic array.
Setting the formula for a multiple-cell range fills all cells in the range with the formula.

的关系数据源和 OLAP 属性，此属性始终为False。尝试对为属性设置为True或关系字段将返回运行时错误。 不能设置该属性为True级别如果相同的层次结构的所有其他级别已有此设置设置为True。至少一个的层次结构级别必须具有此属性设置为False。尝试执行此操作将返回一个运行时错误。
Returns True for hidden levels and False for visible (non-hidden) levels.
This property is applicable only to levels of OLAP hierarchies.

For relational data sources and OLAP attributes, this property is always False. Trying to set it to True for an attribute or a relational field will return a run-time error. It is not possible to set this property to True for a level if all other levels of the same hierarchy already have this setting set to True. At least one level of a hierarchy has to have this property set to False. Attempting to do this will return a run-time error.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IncludeNewItemsInFilter { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 使开发人员可以指定是否应手动筛选应用于时跟踪排除或包括项目。

span.span: Allows developers to specify whether excluded or included items should be tracked when manual filtering is applied to the .

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

remarks.span:
此属性的默认值为False。
应用手动筛选时，开发人员可以设置属性设置为True以跟踪排除的项目。他们可以将属性设置为False来跟踪包含的项目。 如果新项目添加到源数据后属性设置为True，新的项目中显示下一个刷新操作，因为它们不是 Excel 正在跟踪的项目的集合中后。此设置设置
的 OLAP 层次结构对象，并尝试将其设置在是层次结构的一部分的 s 将会失败 （并运行时错误）。您可以获取此设置中的s 属于的层次结构，它将返回与相应相同属性。
切换此设置将清除下列集合： ， ， ，和。 当设置为False，和集合为空，并且无法向它们添加项目。 尝试添加项目时，将返回运行时错误。 当设置为True，和集合为空，并且无法向它们添加项目。 尝试添加项目时，则返回一个运行时错误。
中s，此设置在对象。切换此设置不会更改筛选状态。

span.para: The default value for this property is False.

When manual filtering is applied, developers can set the property to True to track excluded items. They can set the property to False to track included items. If new items are added to the source data after the property is set to True, the new items appear in the after the next refresh operation because they are not in the collection of items that Excel is tracking.

For OLAP hierarchies this setting is set on the object, and trying to set it on s that are part of a hierarchy will fail (with a run-time error). You can get this setting from the s that are part of a hierarchy and it will return the same as the corresponding property.

Toggling this setting will clear the following collections: , , , and . When is set to False, the and collections are empty and items cannot be added to them. A run-time error is returned when attempting to add items. When is set to True, the and collections are empty and items cannot be added to them. A run-time error is returned when attempting to add items.
In s, this setting is set on the object. Toggling this setting will not change the filter state.

For OLAP data sources, setting this property for one field in a hierarchy sets the orientation for the other fields in the same hierarchy. Dimension fields can only be oriented in the row, column, and page field areas of the PivotTable report. Measure fields can only be oriented in the data area. Setting a hierarchy or data field to xlHidden removes the hierarchy or field from the PivotTable report.

Setting this property will rearrange the order of the properties for this cube field. This property is one-based. The allowable range is from one to the maximum number of member property fields being displayed for the hierarchy.
If the property is False, using the PropertyOrder property will create a run-time error.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ServerBased { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如果指定数据透视表的数据源为外部数据源，并且只检索与选定页字段相匹配的数据项，则该属性值为 True。Boolean 类型，可读写。

span.span: True if the data source for the specified PivotTable report is external and only the items matching the page field selection are retrieved. Read/write Boolean.

span.para: 此属性不适用于 OLAP 数据源，且始终为False。
当此属性为True时，检索在数据库中仅所选的页字段项相匹配的记录。此后，可以在用户更改选定页字段，每当新选中的页字段项传递给作为参数，查询和刷新缓存。
如果任何以下条件为真，则不能设置此属性：

item.description: 缓存共享由两个或多个数据透视表报告。
的字段是不是基于的服务器 （即备注字段或 OLE 对象） 数据类型。

span.para: This property doesn’t apply to OLAP data sources and is always False.

When this property is True, only records in the database that match the selected page field item are retrieved. From then on, whenever the user changes the page field selection, the newly selected page field item is passed to the query as a parameter, and the cache is refreshed.
This property cannot be set if any of the following conditions are true:

item.description: The cache is shared by two or more PivotTable reports.
The field is a data type that cannot be server based (a memo field or an OLE object).

span.para: If is set to True for a , then specifies which member property caption to display. If none is specified, the first member property of that (in data source order) will be displayed as the caption for items of that .
If is set to False, then the regular captions are used for the .
If you try to set to True for a with no member properties, a run-time error is returned. For s with no member properties, the property will always be False.
